item.title: Getting started with QTP
item.description: Installation # Running the installer will set up the application along with any and all available add-ons to enable additional functionality (for example, the Web add-on is required in order to allow QTP to control browser objects, the Terminal add-on allows it to control terminal emulator applications, the Java application allows it to control Java applications and so on). It also lets the user specify the License setup from two options - Single Seat or Concurrent.
